job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to the implementation of Machine Learning models, a core aspect of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Modellen die voorspellen welke advertentie banner/creative het meest geschikt is voor een online bezoeker
job_tasks.justification: Describes the development of predictive models, a key component of the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor most likely converters/clickers van advertentie campagnes
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions predictive modeling for specific business outcomes, fitting the Modeling category.

job_tasks.phrase: Predictieve modellen voor het voorspellen van leeftijd en gender van DPG Media online bezoekers obv geconsumeerde content
job_tasks.justification: Further specifies the creation of predictive models for user attributes, aligning with the Modeling task.

job_tasks.phrase: Toevoegen van profile enrichments in batch & real-time flows in een big data environment
job_tasks.justification: This involves processing and enriching data within big data flows, which falls under Data Engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Building data pipelines and dashboards for monitoring and alerting are classic Data Engineering responsibilities.

job_tasks.phrase: werkt mee aan onze web applicaties
job_tasks.justification: Indicates involvement in developing web applications, a core Software Development task.

job_tasks.phrase: You build it, you run it mentaliteit (development & devops, infra-as-code, CICD, …)
job_tasks.justification: This directly points to MLOps practices like DevOps, infra-as-code, and CICD.

job_tasks.phrase: Je bouwt samen met de Data & ML engineers ons ML Ops platform uit
job_tasks.justification: Explicitly mentions building an ML Ops platform, which is a key MLOps task.

job_tasks.phrase: Je integreert onze services met andere DPG teams die van onze data services gebruik maken
job_tasks.justification: Integrating services with other teams is a typical Software Development and system integration activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Indien gewenst, bouw je mee aan onze web-applicaties (voor interne & externe gebruikers) die onze data-producten ontsluiten
job_tasks.justification: This reinforces the Software Development aspect, focusing on building applications to expose data products.

job_tasks.phrase: analyseert requirements, experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters, implementeert & presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
job_tasks.justification: Analyzing requirements and presenting results to business teams shows an understanding of business needs and bridging the gap with technical solutions.

job_tasks.phrase: Data pipelines & dashboards voor quality monitoring & alerting
job_tasks.justification: Monitoring and alerting are crucial operational aspects of ML systems.

soft_skills.phrase: presenteert resultaten naar het dev & business team
experimenteert met verschillende modellen, onderbouwt je keuzes adhv quality parameters
Je neemt ownership & accountability voor bepaalde modellen, jobs & applicaties
You build it, you run it mentaliteit

classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes the implementation and prediction of traditional ML models for digital advertising, aligning with the core definition of an ML Engineer. While some MLOps and software development tasks are mentioned, the primary focus remains on building and deploying predictive models and the associated data pipelines, rather than generative AI applications.
